Question: When **** was asked about the scar he was reluctant to answer.
Hints: His third son, Gregory Hancock ****, was born a year later on November 12, 1931 in Kansas City.
In the spring of 1939, this person crossed to Cuba in his boat to live in the Hotel Ambos Mundos in Havana.
Six months earlier, this person had met F Scott Fitzgerald, and the pair formed a friendship of "admiration and hostility".
